text: Hinnay ken taamoomi diteetay adda xer badal taniy, Haffo buultay, aka haffo amol kak taniy maggo Qubul amol kak yanih inna, is diteetay garab garab amol kak yani kinni, ama diteh addat yan seehadayti isi gaba yeyyeeqeh fayya heek tet yablem maxayyoysa, Yalli iimaan noori lubbil kah hee weeh tirri hee wee num, toysa tirri kaa haytam matan
